replies.body: Why the name PresidentBadger?
replies.body_tagged: Why the name PresidentBadger?

replies.body: I've had a hella lot of name changes, and I thought something was missing. I tried my best to stay away from it, but I realized I couldn't have a name without the word "Badger" in it. weird but true, haha.
replies.body_tagged: I've had a hella lot of name changes, and I thought something was missing. I tried my best to stay away from it, but I realized I couldn't have a name without the word "Badger" in it. weird but true, haha.

replies.body: What's your weirdest Minecraft experience?
replies.body_tagged: What's your weirdest Minecraft experience?

replies.body: Not many, but probably seeing people in nude skins crouching and slowly walking towards me on faction servers. And saying some really pedo-like stuff here and there.
replies.body_tagged: Not many, but probably seeing people in nude skins crouching and slowly walking towards me on faction servers. And saying some really pedo-like stuff here and there.

replies.body:
Well, PresidentBadger sounds infinitely better than President Trump :P
Did you get your "Badger/Bader" name from this?
replies.body_tagged:
Well, PresidentBadger sounds infinitely better than President Trump :P

replies.body:
Nah, when I first got my Xbox 360 I for some reason thought of "Da Badger" as my profile name, lol. I hen got attached to the name and yeah.

Although, that song would make a great theme  song for my election!

@Jake

1) It'd start a war, and there's enough chaos going around with this Trump guy.

2) I don't know you too well, but you seem like a good law abiding citizen. <3


@Smit

1) I'd make you a very...very....powerful person.
